name: Cubes Mirage
description:
A Top Down Shooter game made using Unity Engine in 7 days. I Made this game for a YouTube video and decided to upload for everyone to play. As it was only 7 days there are sure to be bugs.

Be prepared to survive as long as you can against the deadly enemies that await. It may get challenging, but rise up and take the top score on the leaderboard.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Fire Weapon

Right Click: Wall Ability

Space: Fire Missiles(Needs PowerUp)

My Youtube Channel
